modmenu.descriptionTranslation.flashback: Record your Minecraft gameplay, play it back and create stunning cinematic shots
flashback.select_replay.delete_question: Are you sure you want to delete this replay?
flashback.option.recording_controls.loca: Location of the Flashback buttons in the Minecraft pause menu
flashback.option.recording_controls.auto: Automatically start a replay recording when joining a world/server
Automatically finish a replay recording when exiting the world/server
flashback.option.recording_controls.show: Show toasts in the top right when starting/stopping a replay recording
flashback.option.recording_controls.quic: Save the replay with default values instead of opening the Save Replay screen
flashback.option.recording.mark_dimensio: Automatically add a marker to the replay when switching dimensions
flashback.option.recording.record_hotbar: Adds first-person hotbar information into the replay
flashback.option.recording.local_player_: The update rate per second for the position/angle of the first-person player. If you are planning to export your own first-person perspective, you should increase this to the framerate you want to export at
flashback.option.recording.record_voice_: Adds voice chat from SimpleVoiceChat into the replay
flashback.export_filename_tooltip:
The default filename when exporting
Variables:
  %% date%% => year-month-day
  %%time%% => hh_mm_ss
  %%replay%% => Replay name
  %%seq%% => Export count for this session
flashback.dummy_render_frames_descriptio:
This will make the exporter render extra dummy frames before saving a frame.
This will DRASTICALLY increase the time it takes to export, but may be necessary when using shaders that rely on temporal accumulation or mods which lack support for FREX Flawless Frames
flashback.default_interpolation_descript: The default interpolation to use when creating new keyframes
flashback.use_realtime_interpolation_des: Interpolate between keyframes based on the realtime difference. Disable to use the tick difference for interpolation
flashback.advanced_description: Don't change any of these unless you know what you're doing!! If you change one of these and then ask for support you will be made fun of!!
flashback.confirm_delete_replay_message: Are you sure you want to delete the recording? You won't be able to recover it
flashback.recording_folder_missing: Recording folder seems to be missing. Did you delete it?
flashback.registry.mismatch1: Mismatch between current registry data and registry data at the time of replay
flashback.registry.mismatch2: If mods have been added/removed, the replay may not work!
flashback.registry.mismatch3: If you're sure you want to load this replay, click "%s", otherwise go back
flashback.command_only_inside_replay: /%s is only available inside a Flashback replay
flashback.hide_command.n_entities_hidden: %s entities are now hidden during export
flashback.show_command.n_entities_shown: %s entities are no longer hidden during export
flashback.unsupported_loader.message:
You are using an unsupported modloader: %1$s

Do not report crashes, bugs or other issues to Flashback

You will not receive support from Flashback

If you need assistance, please contact %1$s
flashback.recovery3: This is usually because the game closed unexpectedly while recording
flashback.recovery4: Unfortunately, up to 5 minutes of gameplay from the end of the recording may be lost
flashback.recovery5: Would you like to try to recover the recording?
flashback.incompatible_with_recording_de:
You have mods which are known to cause issues when recording replays
Please remove the following mods in order to be able to record replays:
flashback.toast.already_recording_descri: Cannot start new recording when already recording
flashback.toast.cant_finish_when_not_rec: Cannot finish recording when not recording
flashback.confirm_cancel_recording_descr: Are you sure you want to cancel the recording? You won't be able to recover it
flashback.incompatible_replay_version:
Unable to open replay
Replay was created in %s and is incompatible with %s
flashback.incompatible_replay_version_pr:
Unable to open replay
Replay was created with protocol version %s and is incompatible with %s
flashback.maybe_incompatible_replay_vers:
Important Warning
Replay was created in %s and may fail to load in %s

Important Warning
Replay was created with data version %s and may fail to load in %s
flashback.maybe_incompatible_registry_da:
Important Warning
Mismatch between current registry data and registry data at the time of replay
If mods have been added/removed, the replay may not work
flashback.incompatible_with_viewing_desc:
You have mods which are known to cause crashes when loading replays
Please remove the following mods in order to be able to load replays:
flashback.tip1: To export a video, click on 'File' in the main menu bar and then select 'Export Video'
flashback.tip2: Use the [I] and [O] keybinds to set In/Out points on the timeline, controlling what section is exported
flashback.tip3: Right-click on players/entities in the world to get a popup with lots of useful functions
flashback.tip4: Keyframes can be copied and pasted using Ctrl+C and Ctrl+V
flashback.tip5: Change the interpolation of keyframes by right-clicking them and changing the 'Type'
flashback.tip6: Use the left/right arrow keys to move the playhead forwards/backwards 1 tick. You can also use the up/down arrow keys to jump to the next/last keyframe
flashback.tip7: While clicking the main view, use the scroll wheel to adjust the flight speed
flashback.tip8: Use the draggable bar at the bottom of the timeline, or the scroll wheel while hovering the timeline, to adjust the timeline zoom
flashback.tip9: Export with a transparent sky by first unticking 'Render Sky' in the Visuals window and then ticking 'Transparent Sky' in the export window
flashback.tip10: Use /hide [entity] to hide entities using a command instead of the right-click popup. This is useful if you have too many entities to select manually. You can use /show [entity] to show them again.
flashback.tip11: Join the Flashback discord at https://discord.gg/flashbacktool for support and to talk to other people using the mod
flashback.name: Name
flashback.ssaa_tooltip: Supersampling Anti-Aliasing: Remove jagged edges by rendering the game at double resolution and downscaling
flashback.no_gui_tooltip: Removes all UI from the screen, rendering only the world
flashback.render_filter_affirmation: I, %s, do solemnly swear (or affirm) that I will not toggle something off in the 'Render Filter' menu and then later ask in Flashback support why the entity is not being rendered.
flashback.particles_note: Note: Due to technical limitations, will only prevent new particles from spawning. Existing particles won't be affected.
flashback.reset_rng_tooltip: Attempts to remove randomness from the replay in order to produce more consistent outputs when recording the same scene multiple times
flashback.incompatible_with_exporting_de:
You have some mods installed which are known to cause crashes/rendering issues.
If you encounter problems exporting, please try removing the following mods:
flashback.gif_output_warning: Warning: GIF output can be extremely large. Please ensure you know the limitations of the GIF format before exporting. You might be better off using WebP which is a similar but better format
flashback.hold_shift_to_snap_to_keyframe: Hold SHIFT to snap to keyframes
flashback.timelapse_explanation:
This keyframe's Time must be greater than the Time on the left.
The left keyframe must be set to the base time, e.g. 0s and the right keyframe must be set to the duration of the timelapse e.g. 10s
flashback.camera_keyframes_not_needed: Camera keyframes aren't needed for spectating a player!
flashback.delete_scene_confirm1: Are you sure you want to delete this scene?
flashback.delete_scene_confirm3: You will not be able to undo this action
flashback.tracking_body_part.head: Head
flashback.freeze_delay_tooltip:
Smooth freeze delay (in ticks)
Setting this will make the game gradually slow down over the specified delay until it comes to a freeze
flashback.registry_warning_description: An error occured while loading registry data, replay is probably broken... see logs for stacktrace
flashback.player_spawn_warning: CRITICAL ERROR: FAILED TO SPAWN PLAYER
flashback.player_spawn_warning_descripti: An error occurred while trying to spawn a player. Most likely this is caused by a mod incompatibility... see logs for stacktrace
